concept.title: Console
concept.shortdesc: The console provides a user interface to configure pipelines, preview data, monitor pipelines, and view a snapshot.

conbody.p: Data Collector consoleoverviewThe console includes the following general areas and icons:

strow.stentry: Canvas for configuring or monitoring a pipeline.
Properties panel / Preview panel / Monitor panel

When you configure a pipeline, the Properties panel displays the properties of the pipeline or selected stage.
When you preview data, the Preview panel displays the input and output data for the selected stage or group of stages.When you monitor a running pipeline, the Monitor panel displays real-time metrics and statistics.
You can resize, minimize and maximize the panel.
Library of pipelines available to the .
Icon to display or hide the library.
Allows you to import, export, duplicate, or delete the selected pipeline.
Provides context-sensitive help based on the information in the panel.

conbody.p: For information about pipeline configuration options, see .
For information about data preview options, see .
For information about pipeline monitoring options, see .
